name: Apocalyptic Allies
description:
You are a mutated survivor you have left your home to get supplies. But when out for supplies your "spine" attacks some mutants on the way home. It doesn't want food it want's blood!

Controls

All controls besides escape can be swapped in options.

  • Z to confirm
  • Arrow Keys for Movement
  • Escape to Pause the game
  • Feel free to skip attacks for load back after death  from checkpoints
  • Space allows you to quickly skip attacks

The HTML version can get stuck if your not selecting it, you can click on the window to fix this. Also if you have windows the downloaded version runs better.

Credits

  • The_crawling_chaos, programing and levels
  • Zecerman, all art assets (https://www.deviantart.com/zecerman)
